channel.title: AUXY to AUM? [Audio FLOW / InterAPP]
channel.description:
Hi Guys, is AUXY compatible with AUM (audio sharing / interApp..) ? Actually i am owning AudioBus and it is not recognized... Do you guess AUXY woul dbe updated in this direction later? or any other suggestions?
Thanks T./

item.title: AUXY to AUM? [Audio FLOW / InterAPP]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Arimyth:

it’s definitely being pushed for by a lot of Auxy users.

That’s possibly an over-statement.
It’s true there are a good handful of users on this forum who have expressed that they’d like to see it return to Auxy. But, even as a % of total members here, it’s relatively small. One might assume that 90%+ of Auxy users aren’t on this forum. So, as a % of all Auxy users, it’s tiny.

…unless there’s another feedback channel that Auxy is listening to.

Point being, I think requests for MIDI i/o, AudioBus, etc… support is still some distance away from reaching a critical mass (where it makes good business sense to spend money [re-]supporting it).

The additional obstacle is that Lenberg believes that inter-app functionality isn’t the way forward. So, we’d need to break through his philosophical objection to supporting MIDI i/o, AudioBus, etc… first.

But, who knows, maybe they’ll surprise us.

Read full topic

item.title: AUXY to AUM? [Audio FLOW / InterAPP]
item.dc:creator: TH3_WH4L3
item.description:
Yea, there’s no inner-app support with Auxy. However, you can import your Auxy song as a .wav file into audiobus, chop it up into samples and audio paste each sample into another app (iMaschine 2, Launchpad or GarageBand are great examples).

Read full topic

item.title: AUXY to AUM? [Audio FLOW / InterAPP]
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
Auxy does not have MIDI support or the ability to connect to external apps through audio sharing platforms, including AudioBus.

It’s not really known whether Auxy will support it in the future, although it’s definitely being pushed for by a lot of Auxy users.

Read full topic
